message: Hera- You're the Queen of the Gods and the Goddess of marriage, women and birth. You are known to be temperamental but only to those who are unfaithful to you. They will get what they deserve, your revenge knows no limits! When you are not plotting against a traitor, you cherish and value the miracle of life, childbirth and hold onto your vows, who are extremely sacred to you. You are after all.. a Queen!

I agree with you. However, not all apples are equal. Sure would be nice to know the carrots came from land that wasn't full of residual pesticides. That the burgers weren't pink slime, that the lettuce hadn't been sprayed with poison and the milk was actually healthy. I don't think vending machines belong in public schools, but if they are water and both chewy and crunchy nutrition bars should be the only options. That should be a district choice though. The PE and playground time is another issue important to our children's health.

The point is that there were some beta/developing parts of the game that have been shown, based on which the further development phase would be built, depending on the funding. This is such a misleading article. I'm not even into games, but find this highly offensive from an accurate truth point of view. I do hope the title is meant to be read as a sign of hope, people pay that money because they probably want to see the game be made. How can you expect a fully functional game of that size before putting in considerable amounts of money? Just think of the latest GTA with a 1/4 of a billion funding. Have some faith in creativity .
